channel.title: chinese on Rumor Theory
channel.description: Recent content in chinese on Rumor Theory

item.title: Belarus' president dismisses coronavirus risk, encourages citizens to drink vodka and visit saunas
item.description: As countries around the world effectively shut down in order to tackle the spread of the coronavirus, the president of Belarus has urged citizens to drink vodka, go to saunas and return to work.

item.title: 30 березня. No time to die: Іспанія продовжила надзвичайний стан, в США не впораються до Великодня, король Таїланду ізолювався з гаремом
item.description: Офіційні дані актуальні на 11:00 30 березня Україна. 480 хворих В Україні за весь час пандемії виявили 480 хворих на Covid–19. За минулу добу плюс 62 (що на 47 випадків менше, ніж днем раніше).

item.title: Apa Itu Darurat Sipil?
item.description: Apa Itu Darurat Sipil? Darurat sipil adalah serangkaian peraturan yang tertuang dalam Peraturan Pemerintah Pengganti Undang-Undang atau Perpu Nomor 23 Tahun 1959 tentang Pencabutan UU Nomor 74 Tahun 1957 dan Menetapkan Keadaan Bahaya.

item.title: 180 millió nő mindennapjait keseríti meg az endometriózis
item.description: Mély fájdalommal tudatjuk, hogy szeretett édesapánk és nagypapánk NAGY JÓZSEF 2020. március 21-én életének 73. évében hosszan tartó betegség után távozott közülünk. Utolsó útjára a kecskeméti Köztemetőben kísérhetik el mindazok, akik szerették és ismerték 2020.

item.title: How to defend a PhD remotely
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Videoconferencing technology can help researchers to conduct oral exams remotely.Credit: Getty In November 2019, I conducted my PhD defence using the videoconferencing software Zoom.

item.title: - Det fungerte bare ikke
item.description: I januar var det klart for den sjette sesongen av kjærlighetsprogrammet «Gift ved første blikk». Det populære ekteskapseksperimentet går ut på at tre par gifter seg, første gang de møtes, og deretter skal de leve sammen i fem uker som mann og kone - i håp om at kjærligheten vil blomstre.

item.title: Președintele ANOFM: Banii pentru șomajul tehnic ajung pentru toată lumea. Ne pregătim pentru un milion de persoane. Care e procedura
item.description: Agenţia Naţională pentru Ocuparea Forţei de Muncă (ANOFM) este pregătită să plătească indemnizaţii de şomaj tehnic pentru un număr de până la un milion de persoane, a declarat preşedintele instituţiei, Victor Picu, într-un interviu pentru Agerpres.

item.title: 蘋果錢很多！美銀喊買：Covid-19只是短期衝擊
item.description: 蘋果 (AAPL-US) 週一獲美銀提振股價，美銀全球研究分析師 Wamsi Mohan 重申其「買進

item.title: Flight tracker shows contrast between NZ, US lockdowns
item.description: A live flight tracker reveals the impressive impact on New Zealand’s travel restrictions compared to the United States of America (US). Nanotechnologist Dr Michelle Dickinson, also known as Nanogirl, shared a surreal tweet comparing flights operating in New Zealand to the US.

item.title: Правительство изменило список товаров первой необходимости
item.description: Заняться ремонтом в квартире или починить своими силами автомобиль во время “карантинной” нерабочей недели будет сложно. Необходимые для этого материалы, инструменты и запчасти больше не относятся к предметами первой необходимости, и, соответственно, купить их пока что будет нельзя.

item.title: Recibos verdes sem trabalho só podem pedir apoio a partir de 1 de Abril
item.description: O formulário que os trabalhadores independentes têm de preencher para receber o apoio extraordinário se estiverem a enfrentar uma paragem total na sua actividade só será disponibilizado no portal Segurança Social Directa a 1 de Abril.

item.title: German state financial minister kills himself over coronavirus ‘despair’
item.description: Sign up for our special edition newsletter to get a daily update on the coronavirus pandemic. A German state finance minister took his own life after expressing “despair” over how to handle the economic fallout from coronavirus, an official said.

item.title: Good Friday 2020: what is the Christian holiday and when is it this year?
item.description: With many businesses shut, tens of thousands of employees furloughed, and millions of others working from home, plenty of people will be looking forward to the Easter bank holiday weekend this year.

item.title: Un tigre o un pingüino en tu salón, el nuevo truco de Google con animales 3D
item.description: Google permite entretenernos con una sencillísima funcionalidad a través del teléfono móvil y Chrome. Este truco funciona de igual modo para iphone como Android y el resultado es el de una gran sorpresa que se llevarán los más pequeños de la casa.

item.title: Survivor Sercan Yıldırım kimdir? Sercan Yıldırım kaç yaşında, nereli?
item.description: Survivor’da erkek yarışmacılar arasında en dikkat çeken isimlerden biri de Sercan Yıldırım. Ünlüler ekibinde mücadele eden eski milli futbolcu hem performası hem de karakteriyle ön plana çıkıyor. Peki Survivor Sercan Yıldırım kimdir?

item.title: Suicide Squad Helmer David Ayer On Joker & Harley Quinn's Relationship
item.description: ‘Suicide Squad’ Director David Ayer Reveals New Details About Joker & Harley Quinn’s Relationship Suicide Squad director David Ayer recently gave fans some brand new details about Joker and Harley Quinn’s relationship.

item.title: German state finance minister Thomas Schäfer found dead
item.description: The body of a man identified as Thomas Schäfer, the finance minister of the German state of Hesse, was found on a high-speed train line in the town of Hochheim between Frankfurt and Mainz, police confirmed Saturday.

item.title: College Student Wonders: In Hardcore Kenya, Is COVID-19 Lockdown Needed?
item.description: College Student Wonders: In Hardcore Kenya, Is COVID-19 Lockdown Needed? As Kenya shuts down to stop the spread of the Coronavirus, one young Kenyan says his country has a lot of other threats to worry about.

item.title: Coronavirus : un mois sur la ligne de front en Lombardie
item.description: « La mort viendra et elle aura tes yeux. Cette mort qui est notre compagne du matin jusqu’au soir, sans sommeil, sourde ». Ces vers de Cesare Pavese traduisent en mots la litanie de chiffres qui chaque jour inexorablement depuis désormais un mois raconte la tragédie nationale mais surtout lombarde.

item.title: Daniela Katzenberger: Sophia stört im Schlafzimmer
item.description: Wegen Tochter Sophia Daniela Katzenberger plaudert über Flaute im Bett 26.03.2020, 10:05 Uhr | Seb, t-online.de Am Mittwochabend lief die erste Folge von Daniela Katzenbergers neuer TV-Show. Die Katze sprach recht offen über wenig Zweisamkeit mit Ehemann Lucas.

item.title: Immortal Hulk is the unstoppable ruler of superhero comics
item.description: Humans broke the world. Hulk will finish the job. In the pages of the ongoing Immortal Hulk, Marvel Comics’ raging green giant is on a mission to destroy the civilization that has ravaged the Earth, and break the current systems so that others may build from the wreckage.

item.title: El papa Francisco reza el Padre Nuestro y pide a Dios “misericordia por la humanidad puesta a prueba por el coronavirus”
item.description: “Hoy nos hemos reunido todos los cristianos del mundo para rezar juntos el Padre Nuestro, la oración que Jesús nos enseñó”. El papa Francisco ha comenzado así sus palabras introductorias al rezo al que ha invitado hoy.

item.title: Archbishop Aymond of New Orleans has coronavirus
item.description: New Orleans Archbishop Gregory M. Aymond announced midday March 23 he has tested positive for COVID-19, the disease caused by the coronavirus. “Throughout the coronavirus pandemic, I have been feeling fine.

item.title: Indonesia’s hidden coronavirus cases threaten to overwhelm hospitals
item.description: It was just last month that Indonesia’s coronavirus cases stood at zero, with officials fiercely rejecting suggestions that infections were spreading undetected. Weeks later, 78 fatalities have now been linked to the virus, the highest number in south-east Asia.

item.title: Italian actress Lucia Bose died of coronavirus
item.description: A star of Italian cinema of the neorealism era of the 1950-ies Lucia Bose died as a result of pneumonia that arose after infection with coronavirus Covid-19. On the death of the actress said her son, actor and singer Miguel bosé.

item.title: Zawierzmy Polskę Niepokalanemu Sercu Maryi
item.description: W Święto Zwiastowania Pańskiego odbędzie się dziś akt zawierzenia Polski Niepokalanemu Sercu Maryi. Inicjatywę zapoczątkowało Stowarzyszenie Marsz Niepodległości. Znaleźliśmy się w nadzwyczajnej sytuacji. Nie tylko mamy do czynienia z zagrożeniem epidemicznym, ale i wzrastającymi napięciami geopolitycznymi, wojnami ekonomicznym oraz gospodarczymi, a także starciami ideologicznymi, które uderzają w sedno naszej tożsamości i cywilizacji – zauważył koordynator inicjatywy Wojciech Golonka.

item.title: Gov. Tom Wolf, after days of battles over business closures, touts new state aid program
item.description: Gov. Tom Wolf, in what seemed like an effort to change a dialogue with businesses that has been mostly about forced closures in recent days, announced the availability Wednesday of $60 million in state zero- or low-interest loans for firms with 100 or fewer employees to help them recover from economic damage wrought by the coronavirus pandemic and the state’s resulting restrictions on commerce.

item.title: FDA Grants VERO Biotech Expanded Access Emergency Use for the Treatment of Patients with COVID-19, with the GENOSYL® DS, the First and Only FDA-Approved Tankless System for the Delivery of Inhaled Nit
item.description: The recently FDA-approved GENOSYL® inhaled nitric oxide may have pulmonary and antiviral benefits in treating pulmonary hypertension and acute infectious diseases associated with the novel coronavirus[1] GENOSYL® DS facilitates outpatient use of inhaled nitric oxide in the treatment of cardiopulmonary symptoms associated with COVID-19

item.title: Câmara de Melgaço coloca cerco sanitário em aldeia com 370 habitantes
item.description: A medida já está implementada © Philipp Guelland/EPA Por TSF com Lusa 25 Março, 2020 • 15:50 Partilhar este artigo Facebook Facebook Twitter Twitter WhatsApp WhatsApp E-mail E-mail Partilhar A Câmara de Melgaço implementou esta quarta-feira um cerco sanitário na aldeia de Parada do Monte, com 370 habitantes, após a confirmação do terceiro caso de infeção pelo novo coronavírus, disse à Lusa o presidente do município.

item.title: ’Prins Charles drong niet voor bij coronatest’
item.description: Argar vertelde dit naar aanleiding van de vraag waarom de prins al zo snel getest kon worden en miljoenen medewerkers in de Britse gezondheidszorg niet. Woensdag werd bekend dat de Britse troonopvolger het virus heeft.

item.title: ΕΘΝΙΚΟΣ ΥΜΝΟΣ ( Βίντεο )
item.description: ΕΘΝΙΚΟΣ ΥΜΝΟΣ: Τον Εθνικό Ύμνο της Ελλάδος αποτελούν οι δύο πρώτες στροφές του ποιήματος “Ύμνος εις την Ελευθερίαν”. Γράφτηκε το Μάιο του 1823 στη Ζάκυνθο από τον ποιητή Διονύσιο Σολωμό.

item.title: Las empresas para hacer envíos de dinero durante la cuarentena
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Empresas de giros seguirán prestando sus servicios durante la cuarentena En medio de la situación que está viviendo el país por cuenta del coronavirus, las empresas a nivel nacional han venido tomando decisiones para seguir prestando sus servicios y que los colombianos puedan acceder a ellos sin ningún inconveniente.

item.title: African jazz great Manu Dibango dies in France of virus
item.description: PARIS — Manu Dibango, who fused African rhythms with funk to become one of the most influential musicians in world dance music, died Tuesday with the coronavirus, according to his music publisher.

item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Перенос голосования и неделя выходных: Путин обратился к нации Провести голосование по изменениям в основной закон Российской Федерации планировалось 22 апреля. Принять участие в голосовании смогут граждане старше 18 лет, за исключением недееспособных или тех, кто находится в местах лишения свободы.

item.title: Senaste nytt från myndigheterna om corona i Sverige
item.description: Vid tisdagens presskonferens medverkar bland annat Anders Wallensten från Folkhälsomyndigheten samt Socialstyrelsen och MSB. Vi ser nu över 2000 fall av corona i Sverige. Totalt har 36 avlidit, och för närvarande intensivvårdas 115 personer.

item.title: Non-urgent elective surgeries have been cancelled for now because of coronavirus. Here's what that means
item.description: Non-urgent elective surgeries have been cancelled for now because of coronavirus. Here’s what that means Updated Starting today, non-urgent elective surgeries in Australia’s public hospitals will be suspended. It’s to help preserve resources, including protective equipment, and help the health system prepare for the influx of patients expected in the coming weeks and months due to the coronavirus outbreak.

item.title: Надзвичайний стан: що це таке і в чому нас можуть обмежити
item.description: Відповідаємо на важливі питання про НС: хто, коли і наскільки, а також, чи використала на сьогодні влада наявні інструменти та повноваження для боротьби з коронавірусом сповна? Починаючи із середини минулого тижня, в інформпросторі активно обговорюють можливе запровадження в країні режиму надзвичайного стану (НС).

item.title: Wolf reopens gun shops, orders more residents to stay home
item.description: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) — Even as he ordered residents of another county to stay at home, Gov. Tom Wolf on Tuesday quietly allowed gun shops to reopen on a limited basis during the coronavirus pandemic after several justices of the Pennsylvania Supreme Court urged him to do so.

item.title: Biserică din Capitală, închisă, după ce doi preoți și alți clerici au fost confirmați cu coronavirus
item.description: Biserică din Capitală, închisă, după ce doi preoți și alți clerici au fost confirmați cu coronavirus Biserica Sfântul Dumitru din cartierul bucureștean Colentina a fost închisă după ce doi preoți, doi diaconi, un cântăreț și vânzătoarea de lumânări au fost confirmați pozitiv cu noul coronavirus, a precizat pentru G4Media.

item.title: Ledakan terjadi di Plaza Ramayana Medan, polisi lakukan penyelidikan
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Polisi Tutup Sementara Ramayana Medan Usai Ledakan pada Rabu Siang Plaza Ramayana Medan akan ditutup sementara waktu oleh kepolisian usai terjadi ledakan pada Rabu (25/3/2020) siang.

item.title: Prince Charles tests positive for novel coronavirus
item.description: London (CNN) Prince Charles, Queen Elizabeth II’s son and the heir to the British throne, has tested positive for coronavirus and is now self-isolating in Scotland, his office announced Wednesday.

item.title: Vídeo: Ator da TVI, Sabri Lucas, revela que o filho não tem coronavírus
item.description: Sabri Lucas, conhecido ator da TVI, usou as suas redes sociais esta terça-feira para revelar que o seu filho tinha sido internado no Hospital da Estefânia com sintomas de Covid-19.

item.title: Master Chef: Γιατί τσαντίστηκε ο Λεωνίδας Κουτσόπουλος
item.description: Ένα απαιτητικό Τεστ Δημιουργικότητας απήλαυσε, στο MasterChef της Τετάρτης, τόσο το τηλεοπτικό κοινό όσο και ο Λεωνίδας Κουτσόπουλος. Ο γνωστός σεφ και κριτής στο ριάλιτι μαγειρικής, ωστόσο, δεν έκρυψε την ενόχληση του κατά την εξέλιξη αυτής της δοκιμασίας.

item.title: KCR times his opposition to CAA, NPR ahead of Greater Hyderabad polls
item.description: Ch v m Krishna Rao By Is Telangana Chief Minister K Chandrashekar Rao a trusted friend of Narendra Modi or an unadulterated foe? While some sections and political parties oppose whatever the BJP does regardless of merits, KCR is different.

item.title: Újra divat kenyeret sütni: az eredeti kovászos kenyér készítése
item.description: A jó házi kovászos kenyér készítése egyszerre nagyon könnyű és bonyolult: könnyű a sütésben jártas háziasszonynak, nehéz annak, aki először próbálja. A kenyér egy olyan alap élelmiszer, ami egy háztartásból sem hiányozhat, ez az egyik legkézenfekvőbb táplálékforrásunk: könnyen elérhető, olcsó és szinte mindenhez illik.

item.title: Keukenhof flower gardens won’t open this year, tulip festival also hit
item.description: The Keukenhof flower gardens near Lisse will not open at all this year, because of the coronavirus outbreak. The gardens should have opened on March 21 and close again on May 10, after attracting some one million visitors.

item.title: Индия закрылась на самый масштабный карантин в мире: людям запретили даже выходить из дома В стране застряли десятки тысяч россиян — их выгоняют на улицу, им угрожают насилием — Meduza
item.description: Полицейская проверка во время карантина в Индии. 25 марта 2020 года Arun Sankar / AFP / Scanpix / LETA Из-за коронавируса в Индии отменены полеты и поезда. Работают только основные службы, людям нельзя выходить на улицу

item.title: ESPN’s Katie Nolan finally turns on Tom Brady: ‘F–k you’
item.description: It’s been over a week since Tom Brady announced his decision to leave the New England Patriots and sign with the Tampa Bay Buccaneers, and it’s still all anyone in the sports world is talking about.

item.title: Coronavirus en Jalisco: cómo acceder a los apoyos del gobierno
item.description: “Con estos ajustes, Jalisco mantiene el llamado al aislamiento social. Que hasta ahora no ha permitido enfrentar de la mejor manera esta crisis. Adicionalmente, el día de hoy por la noche, quedarán publicadas las reglas de operación de los apoyos para micro y pequeñas empresas, así como para la población en autoempleo o el comercio informal.

item.title: Чрезвычайное положение или продление карантина: Кабмин рассматривает варианты ограничений
item.description: Иллюстративное фото (РБК-Украина) Кабмин рассматривает различные варианты введения чрезвычайного режима в Украине Сегодня Кабмин примет решение относительно режима, который будет действовать в Украине в связи с противодействием коронавирусу. Об этом сообщил пресс-секретарь министра здравоохранения Артем Дехтяренко в комментарии РБК-Украина.

item.title: Rodrigo Maia cobra que Bolsonaro lidere combate ao coronavírus
item.description: LC Luiz Calcagno (foto: Michel Jesus/ Câmara dos Deputados) Em coletiva de imprensa no início da noite desta quarta-feira (25/3), o presidente da Câmara, Rodrigo Maia (DEM-RJ), criticou o pronunciamento de Jair Bolsonaro e cobrou que o presidente lidere o combate à crise provocada pela pandemia do coronavírus e que envie projetos de lei para que o Congresso possa aprová-los.

item.title: Covid-19 restrictions don’t stop Ugadi shopping in Karnataka districts
item.description: india Updated: Mar 24, 2020 15:40 IST Hundreds of people came out of their houses in several cities and towns across Karnataka on Tuesday to shop for Wednesday’s Ugadi festival despite the government’s lockdown orders to prevent the spread of coronavirus.

item.title: Ibunda Jokowi Tutup Usia, Sakit & Mohon Doa Warga dari Rumah
item.description: Ibunda dari Presiden RI, Joko Widodo (Jokowi) meninggal dunia, Rabu (25/3/2020). Perempuan bernama Sudjiatmi Notomihardjo atau kerap disapa bu Noto ini, dikabarkan wafat di RST Slamet Riyadi, Solo, Jawa Tengah pukul 16.

item.title: David Walliams Is Releasing A Free Kids Audiobook Everyday
item.description: David Walliams to the rescue David Walliams is releasing a kids audiobook every day for 30 days - for free! The author announced the news in an Instagram post yesterday.

item.title: Happy Navratri 2020: Chaitra Navratri 2020 Wishes, Gudi Padwa, Ugadi Wishes & SMS, Whatsapp Status, Quotes
item.description: May the generous goddess Maa Durga brighten your life with countless blessings. I hope your prayers bring happiness and prosperity. Happy Chaitra Navratri 2020 to you! Today on first NAVRATRA may goddess Durga shower her blessings on you May she give prosperous to you and to your family.

item.title: 帶有Xe顯示核心的Intel Tiger Lake跑贏AMD最快的7nm 整合Vega GPU
item.description: Intel的Tiger Lake CPU有望在今年晚些時候推出，採用該

item.title: Credo Mutwa passes on at 98 years old
item.description: Well-known traditional healer Credo Mutwa has passed away at the age of 98, the SABC reports. The Credo Mutwa foundation has confirmed the passing of the renowned traditional healer. In a statement, the foundation said Mutwa passed on in the early hours of Wednesday morning at Kuruman Hospital “where he was rushed to yesterday”.

item.title: Italie : le pic de mortalité continue de s’éloigner en Lombardie
item.description: Selon les dernières données de la protection civile italienne, la situation s’améliore en Lombardie, épicentre de l'épidémie dans le pays et première région à mettre en place des mesures de confinement.

item.title: King Crimson 現任成員 Bill Rieflin 抗癌失敗 終年 59 歲
item.description: 現任 King Crimson 成員、前 industrail metal 樂隊 Minsitry 鼓手，又與 R.E.M. 有多年合作的音樂人 Bill Rieflin

item.title: חתנו של הנפטר מקורונה: 'אם היו הנחיות ברורות, זה לא היה קורה'
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); אריה בן ה-88 מת מקורונה: ‘היה אדם חזק עד רגעיו האחרונים’ “היה איש יקר ואהוב”. אריה אבן אריה אבן, ניצול שואה בן 88 מירושלים, הוא הקשיש שנפטר אמש (ו’) לאחר שחלה בנגיף הקורונה.

item.title: In a new course on pantomiming, students will study — and dress up as — Charlie Chaplin
item.description: Please support us by disabling your ad blocker on our site. In a new course on pantomiming, students will study — and dress up as — Charlie Chaplin “Topics in Film Studies: European Pantomime and the Films of Charles Chaplin” will explore Charlie Chaplin’s life and the political messages of his works.

item.title: Φωκίδος: Ο κυβερνήτης Καποδίστριας στην πανώλη έκλεισε δια νόμου τους ναούς
item.description: Αγαπητά μου παιδιά, με πόνο ψυχής βιώνω και παρακολουθώ τα όσα διαδραματίζονται στην Πατρίδα μας, αλλά και παγκοσμίως. Μια δοκιμασία που έχουμε να δούμε στη χώρα μας από την εποχή του Καποδίστρια, ο οποίος παρά το ότι ήταν ένας συνειδητός χριστιανός, κλήθηκε να λάβει μέτρα προστασίας για τη χώρα μας το 1828 από την πανώλη και μάλιστα έκλεισε τις εκκλησίες για αόριστο χρόνο.

item.title: India, Day 1: World’s Largest Coronavirus Lockdown Begins
item.description: Manual laborers have no work, farmers cannot tend fields, online retailers and pharmacists have been harassed by overzealous police officers. Countless people have been running out of cash. “The kind of devastation that is going to be faced by the bottom 50 percent of the workers in the informal sector is unimaginable,” said Jayati Ghosh, an economist and professor at the Jawaharlal Nehru University in New Delhi.

item.title: É #FAKE que início do surto de H1N1 no Brasil, em 2009, matou mais que o do novo coronavírus
item.description: Várias mensagens têm circulado na web com a afirmação de que o surto de H1N1 no Brasil, em 2009, matou muito mais gente quando chegou ao país que o do novo coronavírus neste mesmo período.

item.title: Prins Charles har smittats av coronaviruset - uppvisar milda symptom
item.description: Prins Charles vid firandet av 100-årsdagen av första världskrigets slut. Prins Charles är för tillfället i självvald karantän på ett kungligt slott i Skottland. Prins Charles vid firandet av 100-årsdagen av första världskrigets slut.

item.title: Polémicas cámaras vigilan a los confinados en Rusia, donde no se sabe la real magnitud de los infectados
item.description: Moscú - En medio de la pandemia de coronavirus COVID-19 que afecta al mundo, en Moscú, Rusia, el reconocimiento facial se ha convertido en una herramienta clave de la estrategia contra el virus, pese a que los detractores de esta polémica tecnología denuncien que, a largo plazo, podría acabar siendo utilizada con fines políticos.

item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); When Indian actors and stand-up comedians began expressing their opinions about religion and politics, they were told to STFU. The argument was that they weren’t qualified to talk about it.

item.title: DH Exclusive | Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev's Isha centre planned near Nandi Hills
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Spiritual leader Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev of the Isha Yoga Centre of Coimbatore is planning to set up a global spiritual centre at the foothills of Nandi Hills in Chikkaballapur district.

item.title: AB de Villiers asks Sadhguru for a lottery number, the Indian yogi comes up with a witty reply
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); There is one particular post of AB de Villiers that is doing rounds on social media. The former South Africa international recently posted a video of his chat with Sadhguru on Twitter.

item.title: Indian Guru Sadhguru On Living a Joyful Life
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); It might seem unlikely for a spiritual guru to reach rockstar levels of fame and adoration but that’s exactly what’s happened to India’s Sadhguru.

item.title: COVID-19: Sadhguru's Isha Yoga suspends all programmes across world
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Image Source : PTI COVID-19: Sadhguru’s Isha Yoga suspends all programmes across world Responding to the public health advisory issued by the Central government in the wake of the COVID-19, Isha Yoga Centre has announced suspension of all programmes at all its centers around the world until further notice.

item.title: COVID-19 impact: Isha Yoga Center suspends programmes around the world
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); BENGALURU: In response to the public health advisory issued by the Indian government, aimed at containing the spread of COVID-19 in the country, Isha Yoga Center, situated near Coimbatore in Tamil Nadu, has suspended programmes at all its centres around the world until further notice.

item.title: Coronavirus: Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev suspends all Isha Yoga Centre programmes
item.description: (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({}); Joining hands with the centre and the state in containing the spread of coronavirus outbreak, Isha Yoga Centre of noted Spiritual leader Sadhguru Jaggi Vasudev has suspended all its programmes across the world until further notice.
